SELECT /* AppguideAppranking.xml, selectApprankingList, SAC 전시, 2014-03-03*/ Z2.TENANT_ID , Z2.MENU_ID , Z2.PROD_ID , Z2.PART_PROD_ID , Z2.CATALOG_ID , Z2.META_CLSF_CD , Z2.SVC_GRP_CD , Z2.TOP_MENU_ID , Z2.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD , Z2.TOTAL_COUNT FROM (SELECT Z1.TENANT_ID , Z1.MENU_ID , Z1.PROD_ID , Z1.PART_PROD_ID , Z1.CATALOG_ID , Z1.TOP_MENU_ID , Z1.META_CLSF_CD , Z1.SVC_GRP_CD , Z1.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD , Z1.EXPO_ORD_ALWAYS_YN , Z1.EXPO_ORD , Z1.EXPO_ORD_SUB , COUNT(Z1.PROD_ID) OVER () AS TOTAL_COUNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY Z1.EXPO_ORD_ALWAYS_YN DESC, Z1.EXPO_ORD, Z1.EXPO_ORD_SUB) AS RNUM FROM (SELECT A.TENANT_ID , D.MENU_ID , B.PROD_ID , B.PART_PROD_ID , '' AS CATALOG_ID , D.TOP_MENU_ID , E.META_CLSF_CD , E.SVC_GRP_CD , E.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD , A.EXPO_ORD_ALWAYS_YN , A.EXPO_ORD , A.EXPO_ORD_SUB , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.PROD_ID ORDER BY E.REG_DT DESC) AS RN FROM ( SELECT AA.TENANT_ID , AA.LIST_ID , AA.MENU_ID , AA.PROD_ID , AA.STD_DT , AA.EXPO_ORD_ALWAYS_YN , AA.EXPO_ORD , AA.EXPO_ORD_SUB , AA.EXPO_YN , AA.EXPO_START_DT , AA.EXPO_END_DT FROM ( SELECT LP.TENANT_ID , LP.LIST_ID , LP.MENU_ID , LP.PROD_ID , LP.STD_DT , LP.EXPO_ORD_ALWAYS_YN , LP.EXPO_ORD , LP.EXPO_ORD_SUB , LP.EXPO_YN , LP.EXPO_START_DT , LP.EXPO_END_DT ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY LP.EXPO_ORD_ALWAYS_YN DESC ,LP.EXPO_ORD ,LP.EXPO_ORD_SUB ) AS LP_RNUM FROM TB_DP_LIST_PROD LP /* 에피소드 */ , TB_DP_LIST LT WHERE LP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} /* 테넌트ID */ AND LT.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} /* 테넌트ID */ AND LP.LIST_ID = #{listId} AND LP.EXPO_YN = 'Y' /* Y : 노출 (노출여부) */ AND LP.STD_DT = TO_DATE(#{stdDt}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND SYSDATE BETWEEN LP.EXPO_START_DT AND LP.EXPO_END_DT
AND LP.MENU_ID LIKE #{menuId}||'%'
AND LP.LIST_ID = LT.LIST_ID AND LT.EXPO_YN = 'Y' ) AA WHERE AA.LP_RNUM <= 500 ) A , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP B , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_PROD_MAPG C , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY D , TB_DP_PROD E , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD F , TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE G , TB_DP_PROD_DESC H /* 채널 */ WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PART_PROD_ID AND B.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802'
AND E.PROD_CHRG_YN = #{prodCharge} /* 상품유료여부 */
AND A.MENU_ID = C.MENU_ID AND B.PART_PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.MENU_ID = D.MENU_ID AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.PROD_ID = E.PROD_ID AND E.PROD_ID = F.PROD_ID AND F.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND F.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND F.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND F.PROD_ID = G.PROD_ID AND (G.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} OR G.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{anyDeviceModelCd}) AND B.PROD_ID = H.PROD_ID AND H.LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND (CASE WHEN E.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP13' THEN CASE WHEN #{ebookSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHEN E.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP14' THEN CASE WHEN #{comicSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHEN E.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP15' THEN 0 WHEN E.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP16' THEN CASE WHEN E.META_CLSF_CD = 'CT25' THEN CASE WHEN #{musicSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE 1 END WHEN E.TOP_MENU_ID IN ('DP17', 'DP18') THEN CASE WHEN NVL(E.DRM_YN, 'N') = 'Y' AND #{videoDrmSprtYn} = 'N' THEN 0 ELSE CASE WHEN #{sdVideoSprtYn} = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END END ELSE 1 END) = 1 UNION ALL SELECT A.TENANT_ID , ESM.MENU_ID , C.PROD_ID , C.PART_PROD_ID , D.CATALOG_ID , F.TOP_MENU_ID , F.META_CLSF_CD , F.SVC_GRP_CD , F.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD , A.EXPO_ORD_ALWAYS_YN , A.EXPO_ORD , A.EXPO_ORD_SUB , ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY D.CATALOG_ID ORDER BY J.PROD_AMT ASC ) AS RN FROM ( SELECT AA.TENANT_ID , AA.LIST_ID , AA.MENU_ID , AA.PROD_ID , AA.STD_DT , AA.EXPO_ORD_ALWAYS_YN , AA.EXPO_ORD , AA.EXPO_ORD_SUB , AA.EXPO_YN , AA.EXPO_START_DT , AA.EXPO_END_DT FROM ( SELECT LP.TENANT_ID , LP.LIST_ID , LP.MENU_ID , LP.PROD_ID , LP.STD_DT , LP.EXPO_ORD_ALWAYS_YN , LP.EXPO_ORD , LP.EXPO_ORD_SUB , LP.EXPO_YN , LP.EXPO_START_DT , LP.EXPO_END_DT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY LP.EXPO_ORD_ALWAYS_YN DESC ,LP.EXPO_ORD ,LP.EXPO_ORD_SUB ) AS LP_RNUM FROM TB_DP_LIST_PROD LP /* 카탈로그 */ , TB_DP_LIST LT WHERE LP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} /* 테넌트ID */ AND LT.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} /* 테넌트ID */ AND LP.LIST_ID = #{listId} AND LP.EXPO_YN = 'Y' /* Y : 노출 (노출여부) */ AND LP.STD_DT = TO_DATE(#{stdDt}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND SYSDATE BETWEEN LP.EXPO_START_DT AND LP.EXPO_END_DT
AND LP.MENU_ID LIKE #{menuId}||'%'
AND LP.LIST_ID = LT.LIST_ID AND LT.EXPO_YN = 'Y' ) AA WHERE AA.LP_RNUM <= 500 ) A , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP C , TB_DP_SHPG_CATALOG D /* 쇼핑 카탈로그 */ , TB_DP_PROD_CATALOG_MAPG E /* 카탈로그-상품 매핑 */ , TB_DP_MENU_SHPG_MAPG ESM , TB_DP_PROD F , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD G , TB_DP_SHPG_PROD H , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY I , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE J WHERE 1=1 AND A.PROD_ID = D.CATALOG_ID AND G.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND J.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND C.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND D.CATALOG_ID = E.CATALOG_ID AND C.PROD_ID = E.PROD_ID AND C.PROD_ID <> C.PART_PROD_ID AND C.PART_PROD_ID = H.PROD_ID AND D.CATALOG_ID = ESM.CATALOG_ID AND ESM.MENU_ID = I.MENU_ID AND E.BASE_YN = 'Y' AND E.USE_YN = 'Y' AND I.USE_YN = 'Y' AND ESM.BASE_YN = 'Y' AND ESM.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND ESM.MENU_ID LIKE #{menuId}||'%'
AND F.PROD_CHRG_YN = #{prodCharge} /* 상품유료여부 */
AND E.BASE_YN = 'Y' AND E.USE_YN = 'Y' AND I.USE_YN = 'Y' AND ESM.BASE_YN = 'Y' AND ESM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.PROD_ID = F.PROD_ID AND F.PROD_ID = G.PROD_ID AND H.PROD_ID = J.PROD_ID AND G.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND G.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND NVL(D.CHNL_CNT, 0) > 0 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE DV ,TB_CM_DEVICE CM WHERE 1=1 AND DV.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = CM.DEVICE_MODEL_CD AND CM.SCL_SHPG_SPRT_YN = 'Y' /*쇼핑 상품 단말 지원 여부*/ AND (DV.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} OR DV.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{anyDeviceModelCd}) AND DV.PROD_ID = F.PROD_ID )
AND H.B2B_PROD_YN = #{b2bProd}
) Z1 WHERE Z1.RN = 1 ) Z2 WHERE Z2.RNUM BETWEEN #{offset} AND (#{offset}+#{count}-1) ORDER BY RNUM
